openDate.description: Date the customer record was opened.

closeDate.description: Date the customer record was closed.

ownRentCode.description: Indicates whether the customer's principal residence ownership or rental.

ownRentCodeDescription.description: Description of the customer's residence ownership or rental

CommonDemographicsInfo.description: Defines the demographic fields that relate to any type of customer.

processorName.description: The processor name of the external system

applicationName.description: The application name of the external system

ExternalIdentifierInfo.description: Defines external identification of the customer

issuedDate.description: The date the Id was issued

expirationDate.description: Expiry date of the customer identification

verificationStatus.description: Specifies if/how the issued Id was verified

verificationStatusDate.description: The date the issed Id was verified

IdentificationInfo.description: Defines complete set of Documentary Id of the customer

basedInCountryCode.description: Contains the country code associated to the involved party's residence.

basedInCountryName.description: Contains the country name associated to the involved party's residence

birthDate.description: Date of birth of the customer

deathDate.description: The date that the individual was deceased.

gender.description: The gender of the individual customer.

maritalStatus.description: The marital status of the individual customer.

educationLevel.description: Furthest education level completed. (E.g. High School, Associate Degree, College Degree, Masters, PhD, 8th Grade, 12th Grade, etc.)

IndividualDemographicsInfo.description: Defines the demographic fields related to an individual customer.

businessType.description: The classification on the type of business

foundedDate.description: Date of inception of the Organization

OrganizationDemographicsDetails.description: Defines the demographic fields related to an organization customer.

annualSalesAmount.description: Identifies the organizationâ€™s current sales level.

annualSalesDescription.description: Description of the current sales value.

acceptedTimestamp.description: Date and time transaction was accepted by a delivery channel

operatorUTCTimestamp.description: Date and time that the service was completed

startDate.description: Identifies the customer role  effective date.

endDate.description: Identifies the end date of current role of customer.

roleType.description: Categorization of the role the Customer is in related to the financial entity.

startDate.description: The date the name is effective

endDate.description: The date the name is no longer in effect

type.description: Identifies the type of name associated with a customer (ie, DBA, Primary, Alternate, etc)

fullName.description: The full name of the customer

firstName.description: The first name of the customer

midName.description: The middle name of an individual. This may represent a single name, multiple names, or an initial.

lastName.description: The last name of the customer

secondLastName.description: The second last or family name of the individual

prefix.description: The name prefix of the customer

suffix.description: The name suffix of the individual's name

Name.description: Contains fields related to a customer name, such as first name, last name and name type.

emailAddresses.description: Defines an array of email addresses

socialMediaAccounts.description: Defines an array of social media accounts

ContactInfo.description: Defines complete set of Contact information for the customer

id.description: Internal system of record identifier to uniquely identify the Postal Address record

startDate.description: The effective date of the postal address.

legalAddressStartDate.description: The date the address became effective as the legal address of the customer

endDate.description: The expiration date of the postal address.

perpetualStartDate.description: Perpetual calendar month and day represented as 01-31 used for identifying the date the postal address, of category seasonal, will be in effect each year

perpetualEndDate.description: Perpetual calendar month and day represented as 01-31 used for identifying the date the postal address, of category seasonal, will no longer be in effect each year

addressFormatName.description: The address format name identifies the format of the postal address.

addressFormatCountryCode.description: The country code used to look up the name of the postal address format for the postal address.

mailingCode.description: Identifies the usability of the address for direct mailing.

specialInstruction.description: Contains the special instructions associated with the contact point.
specialInstruction.example: Will be available in office working hours, 10 am to 5 pm.

sequenceNumber.description: Order of the postal address entity

preferredIndicator.description: Indicates whether the address is the preferred address for the involved party.

addressLines.description: The address lines associated with the postal address.

locationLines.description: The location lines associated with the postal address.

recipientLines.description: The recipient lines associated with the postal address.

PostalAddress.description: Contains information related to a postal address.

AddressCategory.description: The categorization info for the address

addressLineType.description: Identifies the particular type of address line.  (e.g. Information Line 1, Information Line 2, Destination Line 1, Destination Line 2, Destination Line 3, Location Line 1, Location Line 2, Location Line 3, Location Line 4)

addressLineText.description: Contains the text portion associated with the postal address line type

locationType.description: Identifies the type of address location component.  (e.g. City, Country, County, Delivery Point Bar Code, District, Municipality, Neighborhood, Parish, Postal Code, Postal Code Extension, Province, Region, State, Village)

locationText.description: Contains the text portion associated with the location type

LocationDetail.description: Defines the postal address location details associated with the postal address type and category

sequenceNumber.description: Sequence number used to identify a particular address line.

addressLineText.description: An address line for an Involved Party.

addressLineCode.description: A code identifying the type of address contained in the attribute line text

recipientLineType.description: Identifies the particular type of recipient line.  (e.g. Recipient Line 1, Recipient Line 2)

recipientLineText.description: Contains the text portion associated with the recipient line type

recipientLineName.description: Identifies the type of name associated with the recipient.

recipientLineDescription.description: Description of the name type associated with the Recipient.

contactCode.description: The system of record (SOR) contact type for the point of contact

id.description: Internal system of record  identifier of the phone

startDate.description: The effective date of the phone number.

endDate.description: The expiration date of the phone number.

sequenceNumber.description: Order of the phone number entity

internationalPrefix.description: Code dialed prior to the international number.

countryCallingCode.description: Used to reach the particular telephone system for each nation or special service.

trunkCode.description: Refers to the initial digit(s) to be dialed in a domestic call, prior to the area code (if necessary.

areaCode.description: Used within many nations to route calls to a particular city, region or special service.

telephoneNumber.description: The seven digit number used when dialing locally.

extensionNumber.description: A sub-number that is used when the telephone number is either a central number or toll free.

textEnabledIndicator.description: Identifies whether the telephone is capable of receiving a text message.

specialInstructions.description: Contains the special instructions associated with the phone contact point.

permitSalesCallsIndicator.description: Identifies whether the involved party has given permission to use the telephone number for sales calls.

timezone.description: Specifies the time zone associated with the phone record expressed in IANA format. For example, America/New York.

preferredPhoneIndicator.description: Indicates whether the phone is the preferred phone for phone contact for the involved party.

preferredTextIndicator.description: Indicates whether the text enabled phone is the preferred phone for text message communications for the involved party.

sequenceNumber.description: Order of the phone number entity

PhoneType.description: Identifies the type of telephone number.

contactCode.description: The system of record (SOR) contact type for the point of contact
